content: Choose the option for your direction of travel
During checkout, tell us your preferred departure time, and any other times youâ€™d accept tickets for if that time is not possible
We secure tickets for a journey within 30 minutes of your preferred time if possible, or in your second-choice time range
A QR Code* voucher for your tickets is issued up to 1 month in advance, and at least 1 day before the travel date
